title: I haven't got any lore, and soon neither will you.
body:
So it occurs to me that {{champion:9}} technically has no lore since the Institute he originated from was retconned. Is Riot planning on addressing this? I loved the Harrowing lore reworks hope they might do something like that for him...also if he could get an audio update that would be amazing.
Edit: also it occurs to me the title seems aggressive but isn't intended as such

replies.body: {{champion:64}} was a SUMMONER, in his lore, so technically he doesn't exist anymore
_Sighs in disappointment realizing this doesn't matter and Lee is still here._

Naw, he's just a blind monk.  From Ionia.  Because anything Asian is automatically from Ionia unless said otherwise.

Another reason I dislike Ionia.

someone dodged an Ahri charm
http://static2.gamespot.com/uploads/scale_super/1551/15516851/2941768-lfs17.png

Personal rant: I really dislike her charm.  Only because I know what's going to happen immediately afterwards as I walk towards her.  SPAM ALL THE SPELLS!  

I get this is the fate of all lock down CC.  But it's really annoying to see your character walk into all of that.
eat an orange, it'll be K {{champion:41}} :p
the thing is... oranges don't contain much potassium. They contain mostly vitamin C (Calcium). Bananas contain a lot of Potassium so Soraka's always K{{champion:16}}

I main Pantheon.

But those oranges man...
He was learning to be a summoner. He had too big ego, fucked a summoning, killed a village, then went to a monastery.

I don't think Fiddle will be connected to the Shadow Isles. Seems too whimsical for that.

I think he, like Shaco, and maybe Nocturne could be in this mix, will be connected to the Fey.
Oh hoho...new rivals to {{champion:117}}?

I suggested that the Fey was somehow related to our world by the characteristics of both planes. Since Lulu was taken near Bandle City, which for the most part is a Safe and Fun place, the Fey is just the same: A perfect place for a Yordle to play in.

Nocturne on the other hand, comes the Shadow Isle's version of the Fey, where the Characteristics of both worlds are darkness and pain. As such Nocturne is a predator in the Fey and real world, using Dreams (or whatever) as a portal to lead into our world.
I assumed they would be closer to Tahm Kench as "demons" and /or personifications of Dread, Madness, and Nightmares.

Idk, Fiddle could go any way from here.

Looking at the color of his drain, and him having a lamp, keys and similar weapon to Thresh.  I always wondered if Fiddle was somehow connected to the evil that swept over the Shadow Isles way back when.
Could have been from the vault.
Actually I really like this idea. From the same vault that Thresh was keeping watch over. Which could have been what whispered to him to turn cruel...
Unfortunately, they decided not to make Fiddlesticks a Shadow Isles champion.
Can his lore be something simple like "this scarecrow is just trying to have a good time."

And Graverobber Gary just wants to dig some {{champion:104}} 

{{champion:83}}

{{champion:24}} {{champion:44}}  & {{champion:56}} are pretty much the same.
Also the lores of {{champion:10}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:64}} are pretty much nonfunctioning without the IoW.

Make Kayle and Morgana some pissed off sisters, make lee sin a roaming blind monk who is totally lost and just happens to stumble on the battlefield, and make cho gath hungry as hell. GG lore Well played{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
Yeah, I'm curious as to what they plan to do with Kayle and Morgana, given that their *entire existence in the game* requires summoners and the league of legends...

They once mentioned that Kayle and morgana will retain their otherworldlyness,but its unclear in which way this will happen.

Some speculate that the angels are going to be personifications of the human virtues/ideals(kayle for justice,morgana for freedom),similar to how {{champion:223}} a demon,seems to be the personification of humanitys gluttony and vices.
Storywise Kayle and Morgana would fit rather well into demacia and noxus(as demacia is restrictive,while noxus offers more freedom),but the question is if riot actually wants to add angels to these city states...

You'll have to wait a bit, I'm afraid.  

Jaredan brought up Fiddles as one of the champs who's not on the agenda this year, but maybe next, in a post a few days ago.  

As for where he'll be from, there's an old Red Post from Ant In Oz stating that they were thinking not the Shadow Isles, but something a little stranger.  AiO brought up an "Alice in Wonderland type feel".
{{champion:117}}: That tasted purple.

They know that there's several champs who basically have no lore now that the institute is gone. They'll get to them eventually. Probably.
Um {{champion:28}} lore is just a big ?. without out the institute of war its more like ????
{{champion:64}} has no lore either.

Fiddlesticks could have been an early construct from a character like Xerath or even in the same boat as Maokai; 'golem' brought to life by magic. Perhaps Fiddlesticks is a scarecrow that was possessed by a murderer after he was lynched by an angry mob, only to come back as a scarecrow and haunt them at night, driving the entire town to try to move to an new area only to be followed by the evil spirit, eventually driving the entire town to mass suicide or insanity. With no one to haunt, Fiddlesticks began to run amock.
Could make it so he's from the [Voodoo Lands](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Voodoo_Lands)
I was intimidated by the title. 0/10 no trigger warning.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

I think several folks have suggested the possibility that Nocturne ties in with Zed and could easily be reintroduced as either a creation or part of Zed's ambitions to explore forbidden arts.

Shaco might play along the lines of Evelyn - mercenary for hire. I could imagine him as a former Noxian assassin that became bored with orders and will only take on marks that he finds interesting.

Fiddlesticks could tie in with LeBlanc's lore as a summoned guardian of their order.

Idk if they'll want to change the fact that Shaco is a demon.

I always imagined that him, noct, and fiddle, being very similar, are from the same place.
I have made a lore for Fiddlesticks a while back: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/AGpKqEKd-my-take-on-fiddlesticks-new-lore

I found his lore!

http://i.imgur.com/4vmcWeA.gif

Maybe have fiddle be some sort of result by a ward against swain. Like for example, a family in another part is defending their village from Noxus. Beatrice, Swain's bird watches them and reports back as Swain advances his empire. The father of the family dies on the front line of the battle, right as the harrowing hits, transforming him into a deranged spirit. The spirit takes rest in the closest body, that of a scarecrow used to deter Swain's raven. Deterring the soldiers of Noxus away from his village, Swain is able to capture him, and the spirit escapes. Now whenever the scent of war is in the air, and on every eve of the harrowing, the spirit comes to walk again.

Idk. Sounds kind of weird but at least it's lore{{champion:9}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I wanted them to update Fiddles to a Shadow Isles champ, but they didn't with the Harrowing this year... Maybe next year. :/
They said they're not going to make him a Shadow Isles champion, but they are putting him somewhere else.

I would love if he could just have a whole visual update (Voiceover, Model, VFX and SFX, new splash). I've always reallllly liked Fiddlesticks as a character and his gameplay (somewhat), but him being outdated throws me off from playing him.
I want him to only have stick legs, I think his arms could be more full, if you know what I mean.

I mean yeah but on the other hand though...

CAWCAWCAWCAWCAWCAWCAWCAWCAW

I like it, a conspicuous and vague lore, it does leave room for some unique and creative wondering though.
